patthana16.1:2.1_0: Kusalaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:2.1_1: Kusalaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:2.1_2: Kusalaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:2.1_3: Kusalaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ca naabyākato nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:2.1_4: Kusalaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ca naakusalo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:3.1_0: Akusalaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:3.1_1: Akusalaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:3.1_2: Akusalaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:3.1_3: Akusalaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ca naabyākato nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:3.1_4: Akusalaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ca naakusalo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:4.1_0: Abyākataṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:4.1_1: Abyākataṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:4.1_2: Abyākataṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ca naakusalo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:5.1_0: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.1:6.1_0: Kusalaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.1:9.1_0: Kusalo hetu dhammo nakusalassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.1:9.1_1: Kusalo hetu dhammo naakusalassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.1:9.1_2: Kusalo hetu dhammo naabyākatassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.1:9.1_3: Kusalo hetu dhammo naakusalassa nahetussa ca naabyākatassa nahetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.1:9.1_4: Kusalo hetu dhammo nakusalassa nahetussa ca naakusalassa nahetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.1:10.1_0: Akusalo hetu dhammo naakusalassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … pañca.
patthana16.1:11.1_0: Abyākato hetu dhammo nakusalassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana16.1:12.1_0: Kusalo hetu dhammo nakusalassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.1:13.1_0: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā pannarasa, anantare samanantare sahajāte terasa, aññamaññe nava, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, pacchājāte āsevane nava, vipāke tīṇi, indriye magge aṭṭha, sampayutte vippayutte nava …pe…
patthana16.1:14.1_0: Kusalaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:14.1_1: Kusalaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:15.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha nava.)
